backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user roles, school and student data models, parent links, tutoring session storage, and profile CRUD with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the project.
frontend/.env.example: Template file showing required and optional environment variables for LLM API configuration.
frontend/.gitignore: Gitignore rules preventing local environment files from being committed.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/LLM_DEMO_SETUP.md: Instructions for configuring LLM API credentials for demo use, including provider setup and environment variables.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring providers, authentication, theming, and the AppShell.
frontend/src/app/AppShell.tsx: Authenticated shell handling login, onboarding, role-based routing, and in-app navigation state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component with branding and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with role-based navigation, branding, and user menu including logout support.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login page with Internet Identity authentication and a login button with loading state.
frontend/src/features/auth/useGetCallerU: Provides a React Query hook to fetch the current user's profile, handling actor readiness and loading states.
frontend/src/features/auth/useSaveCaller: Mutation hook to create or update the caller's user profile and invalidate the related query cache.
frontend/src/features/dashboards/parent/: Parent dashboard displaying linked students and selected student progress with loading states and summaries.
Fetches linked students, student progress, and weekly summaries for a parent using React Query.
frontend/src/features/dashboards/student: Student dashboard showing weekly learning stats, recent activity, and navigation to tutor and exam tools.
Retrieves a student's recent activity and weekly summary via React Query with actor-based fetching.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/buil: Converts exam input fields into a formatted user prompt string for the LLM. Handles board, syllabus, marks, and instructions.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/Exam: UI for configuring and generating AI-powered exam papers, handling form state and submission.
Thin wrapper component that mounts the ExamGeneratorPage in the routing system.
Displays a generated exam paper with metadata and grouped questions, optionally showing answers.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/exam: Defines TypeScript types and validation guards for exam papers, questions, and metadata. Ensures LLM responses match the expected schema.
Contains the system prompt enforcing exam-generation rules, JSON output, and syllabus alignment. Used as the base prompt for LLM requests.
Defines frontend-only types for exam requests, boards, and syllabus scope. Used when building requests to the backend and LLM.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/gene: Coordinates prompt construction, LLM API calls, and response parsing to generate an exam paper. Returns success or error with parsed data.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/llmC: Validates and constructs LLM API configuration and request payloads. Reads model, API key, and base URL from environment variables.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/pars: Parses and validates LLM JSON exam paper output and checks mark totals. Strips code blocks and returns structured validation results.
frontend/src/features/examGenerator/useG: React Query mutation hook that triggers exam generation via generateExamPaperSample. Manages loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Onboard: UI page for new users to enter profile details and submit them. Collects name, email, role, and optionally a school.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/useCrea: React Query mutation hook to create a user profile through the backend actor. Invalidates the current profile cache on success.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/useGetS: Fetches the list of schools via backend actor using React Query. Enables only when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/features/tutor/buildTutorUs: Builds a structured prompt string for the tutor LLM based on grade, subject, topic, and question.
frontend/src/features/tutor/generateTuto: Sends prompts to the LLM API using configured settings and returns the tutor's generated text response.
frontend/src/features/tutor/TutorPage.ts: UI page for the AI tutor, handling question input, LLM response generation, and session saving.
frontend/src/features/tutor/tutorSystemP: Defines the system prompt enforcing tutoring guidelines and structured responses.
frontend/src/features/tutor/useRecordTut: React Query mutation hook that records a tutoring session via the backend actor and triggers progress updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module centralizing React Query usage, delegating real hooks to feature directories.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom education-themed color variables and typography enhancements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and utility extensions with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's current state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for an AI Tutor app with exam generation and billing.
